description: When Professor Tsurarer revealed his true, Linda and company thought that he would send out a Freegeo to battle against them because he was wearing a Freegeo mask and his persona is based off of a Freegeo but he wasn`t able to capture one as it was too strong for him to get it. Instead, his main Pok√©mon is a Vanirich but it was defeated by Charles.
name: Vanirich (Tsuraraa-hakase)
